name: Bubble Boy (StanfordStudentGames, axlablaze, Geraldine)
description:
Bubble Boy is a 2D puzzle platformer. Follow Little Timmy as he attempts to discover the mystery behind his father's disappearance, after having been shrunk to the size of an ant!

This game was created by Lucas Ramos, Geraldine Millos-Lopez, and Ben JX Wu.
